I managed to create a machine with my basic knowledge of chip-crafting, which gives me ideal conditions for assembling these components.

The main part is made up of a metal frame with various pieces of machinery for assembly and testing. Additionally, the facility makes it possible to perform the crucial steps of assembly in a very clean environment, which has proven to be imperative for the success of the component.
An item created here always consists of 3 components, which are placed in the central 3 slots. Their order is of importance! The finished product can be taken from the big slot beneath.

Although the surroundings are optimal, the quality of the actual component can't be fully predicted. That being said, upon assembly a random value for core/ram/chippower gets created. A minimum value is set by the recipe used.
The maximum value usually is only slightly higher than minimum, but can be increased noticeably by supplying energy and/or Support (becomes available with further research).
Note: There are situations and recipes in which supplied energy/Support gets wasted or isn't wanted.
